Services




Self-Serve

Our machines are routinely serviced and maintained for your convenience. Our washing and drying machines operate at varying capacities.

Fluff N' Fold

Too busy to finish your laundry? Just come drop off you assorted belongings in the morning and we’ll have it ready for you in the afternoon.

Commercial Pick Up

Are you a business washing in bulk? We’ll pick up, wash, and deliver your laundry with same or next day delivery. Contact us for a quote!

Amenities



Convenience Store

Our convenience store offers laundry products and detergents. If you’re hungry, we carry snacks and drinks for you to eat while you wait.

Wi-Fi/TV

UCR Coin laundry is equipped with Wi-Fi and two televisions, so you can catch up on work, or the latest season of your favorite show.

Pure Water

Our pure water service provides you with the best water filtering system available, designed to bring you the cleanest water with the best taste.

On-site Assistance

Need any help using our machines and services? Let us know! We have a friendly and professional staff that will be glad to assist you.

Washing Tips

How to avoid shrinking

Avoid excessive heat while washing and drying. Wash with cold water and set the machine to a gentle cycle. Dry on a low heat setting and avoid excessive time in dryer.

Removing oil stains

Set the particular garment aside and scrub affected areas using liquid dish detergent. Proceed to wash the garment by itself with laundry detergent and dry it on a low-heat setting.

Avoiding color loss

Separating garments based on color, and folding each garment inside out are the best ways to avoid color-loss. Follow up by washing with cold water and drying using low heat.
